ConardLi/easy-dataset

Tool for creating, editing, and exporting fine-tuning datasets for LLMs with document processing and multiple export formats

View on index

Related repos

  • curated list of datasets and tools for LLM post-training
  • Compact data format for LLMs
  • turns documents into LLM-ready data chunks
  • Uses LLMs to generate llms.txt files
  • Open-source data annotation platform for LLM development
  • Python toolkit for running LLMs on sensitive documents locally or via cloud, supports Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic, with RAG and document intelligence features
  • Open-source unified API for integrating data sources with LLMs
  • PDF processing toolkit for LLMs
  • Extracts JSON from documents using LLMs
  • Survey of data-centric methods for LLMs
